alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Davidson and Randolph Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of North Carolina Zoo, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... High Point, Asheboro, Randleman, North Carolina Zoo, Seagrove, Liberty, Ramseur, Denton, Franklinville and Staley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central North Carolina.
